messages.content: You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Umagto ako sa baeay sang igkampod.
I went to my cousin's house.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Mataeom ro siyaw.
The knife is sharp.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Maeapad ro eugta ni Mang Kanor.
Mang Kanor's lot is wide.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Nagdamgo ako kabii.
I dreamed last night.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Bilog ro buean.
The moon is round.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Gin-eapog ni Josh ro bola.
Josh threw the ball.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Nagbakae si Maya sa baraka.
Maya bought from the store.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Nagbalintong si Dan sa hagdan.
Dan fell down the stairs.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Mahumot ro bueak.
The flowers smell nice.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Nag-ihapon ako sa baeay sang klasmeyt.
I ate dinner at my classmate's house.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Makaron eang owa nag-ilabas si Jonathan.
Only today did Jonathan not eat lunch.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Mabueak ro eambong nga suksok ni Maria.
The clothes that Maria is wearing are flowery.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Gin-eapog ni Asi ro sudlay sa idaeom it duyan.
Asi threw the comb under the craddle.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Maaeam magsueat it mga istorya nga makataeangis ro akong kaklase.
My classmate is smart when it comes to writing stories that make people cry.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Maeapad ro gaob nga nabu-oe nana sa pagbalintong sa hagdanan.
He got a wide bruise when he fell from the stairs.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginbu-oe ni Sean ro baeonan ni Mark.
Sean took Mark's lunch-box.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Napuno it baeas ro anang banig dahil kakaeangoy na eang sa baybay.
His mat became full of sand because he just went swimming at the beach.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginhueat ni Aaron si Drey nga maghueag agod magdungan sanda.
Aaron waited for Drey so that they could move in unison.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Maeapad ro binakae nga haboe ni Ronnie para sa anang katre.
The blanket that Ronnie bought for his bed was wide.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginbugkos nana ro mga eansang ag gintago sa anang buesa.
He tied the nails together and hid them in his pocket.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Si Bella hay gwapa nga bayi.
Bella is a beautiful girl.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Idto sa bueutangan ro tinapay.
The bread is in the container.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Madasig magdaeagan ro ayam.
The dog runs fast.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Mahilig sa tanom si Janette.
Janette loves plants.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Indi makita ni Jessica ro euwag.
Jessica cannot find the ladle.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Gakita kami hinaga ni Dan sa plaza.
Dan and I will meet at the plaza tomorrow.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Pirmi nga naulihi si Kyle sa klase.
Kyle is always late in class.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Naubos eagi ro kwarta nga ginapadaea ni nanay.
The money that mother sent was already used up.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Nagpaayos ako it ngipon kahapon.
I had my teeth fixed yesterday.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginregaluhan ako ni Nick it pahumot.
Nick gifted me a perfume.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Si Antonio ag Maria ro pangaean it akong ginikanan.
Antonio and Maria are the names of my parents.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginhakwat ni James ro sangka sako nga bugas gamit ra abaga.
James used his shoulders to lift a sack of rice.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Abante it daywa nga puntos ro grupo nanday Edward.
Edward’s team is leading with 2 points.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Mas mabahoe ro alima ni Jane kaysa kay Kaila.
Jane’s hand is bigger than Kaila’s.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ako hay may napueo nga tudlo sa akong daywang alima.
I have 10 fingers on both of my hands.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Adlaw-adlaw ginabunyagan ni lola Rosa ro ana nga mga tanom.
Lola Rosa waters her plants everyday.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Manami ro among ilabas kaina.
Our lunch was very delicious.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Sinampae ni Elsa si Anna dahil imaw hay gapina-ugtas.
Elsa slapped Anna because she is naughty.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Maeapad ro baeay ni Pedro.
Pedro’s house is wide.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Nagbakae it mantika si Juan sa tindahan.
Juan bought oil from the market.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: May an-um nga unga si Lolo Roberto.
Lolo Roberto has six children.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginkaeos it kuring ro akong uyahon.
A cat scratched my face.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Kanami pamantawon ro mga pispis sa sanga it puno.
The birds on the tree branch are nice to look at.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Nagpanglimpyo si Alex sa likod it anda nga baeay gamit ro silhig.
Alex cleaned their backyard using a broom.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginhutik ni Richandrey kay Kaila ro ana nga nailaan.
Richandrey whispered his crush’s name to Kaila.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Manami ro ginabaligya nga panit it manok sa plaza.
The chicken skin being sold at the plaza is delicious.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Ginbuksan ni Amara ro purtahan.
Amara opened the door.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Makahaeawa ro hibayag ni Kate.
Kate’s laugh is contagious.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Haaywanan ni Mikay ro anang kaeo.
Mikay left her hat.
You are a language assistant.
translate to english: Abo kung kumaon it humay si Bobby.
Bobby eats a lot of rice.
You are a language assistant.
